attributes.title: Beware of this app!
attributes.review:
Hi, I don’t usually write reviews, but this app stood out to me as this is our president. The app has a lot of mistakes. It asked for way to much personal information, I understand you want to keep up with your “fans” but this is to much. I would have also liked to keep up with Trump and all his well doings. But we are not getting that. I would like to know how he is combatting others standpoints.  I would like to more about his beliefs and standpoints on current events such as blm, Hispanic lives, lgtbq+, etc. Over all this app isn’t useful and pretty much isn’t what anyone would want from the president.
- a concerned citizen

attributes.title: I ALMOST KILLED MY SISTER BECAUSE OF THIS APP
attributes.review: Because I love and support our cheeto god of a president and would die for his beautiful orange self🟠, I downloaded the Trump app with my sister. However when I opened it something crazy happened!🤭 I was met by a huge flash of light and suddenly Trump supporters surrounded me in the room. 😧They all jumped full speed towards me and I blacked out. When I woke up I was looking up at my sister with scissors raised in my hand ready to strike her.😰I quickly put away the scissors and asked what happened. It became clear to me that I had been possessed by the spirit of trump supporters!😱 I urge you don’t download this app because YOU might me next.😵

attributes.title: Made me cry :(((
attributes.review: This app is cursed!! Ever since I downloaded this app I have had nothing but bad luck! My fish died, I lost my lawn mower and I can’t find my car keys!! I have had multiple mental breakdowns over these tragedies and called/texted my therapist to the point of her blocking me.... AND in top of all that i have had non-stop vomiting and diarrhea! All of this is because if this app, I downloaded it and my life went down hill. Other than being cursed the app took FOREVER to download, caused my phone to freeze for hours and when it finally unfroze it played loud obnoxious music causing my cat to have a seizer and die. My life will never be the same.

attributes.title: horrible.
attributes.review: This app is DISGUSTING. Not only did it give me over 30 viruses when downloading it, but it took weeks for it to even open! I had to get a new phone because it completely fried my new iphone 11. Get your act together Donald. You aren’t helping out nation (especially with this app), you are dividing it in a time of need. I guess you wouldn’t know that though since you’re completely oblivious to issues happening in our country and doing nothing about them (black lives matter, covid 19, etc). There are American people DYING because of YOU and your administration. I can’t wait until you get impeached 🥰💅✨.

attributes.title: worst app literally to ever exist
attributes.review: this app took about 37 hours to download and once it did my phone started to randomly start playing Deepthroat by cupcakke every 5 mins. i only have 2 mins left before it starts playing again so i’ll be quick. anyways, this was just the beginning of the problem, the app wouldn’t even load so i was stuck on a black screen whenver i tried to open it. ANOTHER THING TO ADD!!! this app touched my phone sexually without consent and my phone is a minor, this app has no business being in the app store i hate it i think it should die. please take this off the app store immediately.

attributes.title: This app is HORRIBLE

this is by far the worst app i’ve ever downloaded, it took 3 hours to download and when it finally did it made my phone run super slow. i have perfect wifi and made my whole phone glitchy and i couldn’t use any apps cause it was giving my phone connection issues. when the app finally downloaded it crashed a million times. it also filled up my storage. if i could give this app negative reviews i would. and it was also EXTREMELY pointless. this is not sarcasm it is my real experience and i wanted the word to know. this app should be banned after all the trouble it gave my phone. WORST APP EVER!
